name: Hjarta
description:
What is HJARTA?

Hjarta is a collection of short stories. It is a word from the old norse language and it means 'heart'.

the Cosmonaut

and how he said Farewell
to his Friends and travelled beyond
and into the Unknown.

the Prisoner

that was sentenced
to the Abyss
of Despair.

the Martyr

and how she found Freedom
and saved the Universe.

Hjarta is a point-and-click adventure game for Windows PC. It is designed by Eight Bit Skyline with the AGS Engine and music from Archive.org. Hjarta is freeware.
